tool_description: Lookup location information for any URL domain. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/urllookup.
name: URL Lookup by API-Ninjas
title: URL Lookup by API-Ninjas

api_list.name: v1/urllookup
api_list.description: API Ninjas URL Lookup API endpoint.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: valid URL to check. It supports schemes (e.g. http://example.com) as well as schemeless (e.g. example.com) formats.
